meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>private</radical> <radical>mouth</radical> that's a <kanji>machine</kanji>. But you have to keep your machine mouth private because it would scare all the non-machine people around you.
readingMnemonic: To make sure they can't tell what's <kanji>machine</kanji> and what's human, you <reading>dye</reading> (だい) the mouth to make it look like skin. You find dye the same shade as your normal mouth and just slap it on there.
